}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :WPA3-Enterprise, WPA3-Personal, WMM, WMM-Power Save, :Wi-Fi Direct, Wi-Fi Agile Multiband, Wi-Fi Protected Setup
The full part of the [[MediaTek]] chip used in this device is MT7921KEN.
*[[MediaTek#ax]] '''Filogic 330P''' (AX1200/AX2400) - [https://www.amd.com/en/press-releases/2021-11-18-amd-and-mediatek-develop-amd-rz600-series-wi-fi-6e-modules-to-enhance '''AMD RZ600''' Series Wi-Fi 6E Modules] :* [[MediaTek]] '''MT7921K''' • AX1200 2x2 80MHz (M.2 2230) BT 5.2 ::• [[AMD RZ608]] - Wi-Fi 6E Module • WFA103759 (2021-05-18) • [https://aliexpress.ru/item/1005003630250985.html AE] <!-- 16992 --> :* [[MediaTek]] '''MT7922A''' • AX2400 2x2 160MHz (M.2 2230/1216) BT 5.2 ::• [[AMD RZ616]] - Wi-Fi 6E Module • WFA111375 (2021-05-03) <!-- 101441 -->
{{WiFiCert|WFA103759|01/08/2021|102893}} :[https://api.cert.wi-fi.org/api/certificate/download/public?variantId=16992 WFA103759] (2021-01-08)
==Notes== ===Models=== *[[MediaTek MT7921K Reference Design]] :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7921K/ RAS-MT7921K] (2021-01-05) :2x2 802.11ax (WiFi 6E) + BT/BLE Combo Card *[[MediaTek MT7921 Reference Design]] :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7921 RAS-MT7921] (2020-09-25) :2x2 802.11ax (WiFi 6) + BT/BLE Combo Card
* '''MT7921''' - MediaTek BT chipset BT BB/LM/LL/RF/RF-PHY/HCI :[[MediaTek]] MT7921AU / MT7921S / MT7921L / MT7921K • '''Filogic 330P''' :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_796114C3 [14c3:7961/14c3:7961] • [[MediaTek]] Wi-Fi 6/6E :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_E0B7105B [14c3:7961/105b:e0b7] • [[Foxconn]] Wi-Fi 6 :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_380211AD [14c3:7961/11ad:3802] • [[Lite-On]] MT7921LEN WiFi 6 :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_46801A3B [14c3:7961/1a3b:4680] • [[AzureWave]] AW-XB468NF <!-- (ASUS ROG) MT7921LEN Wi-Fi 6/6E --> <!-- Asus WIFI 6 AX + BT 5.2 (2*2) M.2 2230 - WIFI 6 AX+BT5.2 (2*2) M.2 2230 AZWAVE/AW-XB468NF MT7921L --> :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_46811A3B [14c3:7961/1a3b:4681] • [[AzureWave]] MT7921 WiFi 6 :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_46821A3B [14c3:7961/1a3b:4682] • [[AzureWave]] MT7921 (PCIe) :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_381217AA [14c3:7961/17aa:3812] • [[Lenovo]] :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_E0BC17AA [14c3:7961/17aa:e0bc] • [[Lenovo]] :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_A608&SUBSYS_A60814C3 [14c3:a608/14c3:a608] • ([[AMD]] RZ608ES) MT7921K :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_0608&SUBSYS_060814C3 [14c3:0608/14c3:0608] • ([[AMD RZ608]]) MT7921K :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_0608&SUBSYS_E0C517AA [14c3:0608/17aa:e0c5] • [[Lenovo]]
===WFA ID=== :;[https://www.wi-fi.org/product-finder-results?sort_by=certified&sort_order=desc&keywords=MediaTek MediaTek] *MediaTek MT7921K - WFA103759 (2021-01-08) :Model Number: MT7921K, RZ608 (Wi-Fi 6E) *MediaTek MT7921 - WFA100148 (2020-11-05) :Variant: 2020-11-05 (WFA100148 - 11214038) *MediaTek MT7915 - WFA93165 (2021-01-08) :Model Number: MT7915 (Wi-Fi 6E) *MediaTek MT7915STA - WFA101124 (2021-01-08) :Model Number: MT7915 (Wi-Fi 6E) <!-- *MediaTek MT7915STA - WFA101124 (2021-01-07) :Variant: 2020-07-17 (WFA101124 - 11391079) *MediaTek MT7915 - WFA93165 (2020-10-22) :Variant: 2020-10-22 (WFA93165 - 11720702) *MediaTek MT7915 - WFA93165 (2020-10-19) :Variant: 2020-10-19 (WFA93165 - 11467494) --> *MediaTek MT7663 - WFA101328 (2020-09-26) :Variant: (WFA101328 - 11456610) *[[Elecom WAB-S1775]] - WFA109138 (2020-12-29) :Name: 802.11ax Wireless AP/Router w/ PoE, v4.4.177
==See also== *[[MediaTek MT7922A12L Reference Design]] (NGFF M.2 1216) :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7922A12L/ RAS-MT7922A12L] (2021-10-05) • IC ID: 7542A-MT7922A12L :802.11ax (WiFi 6E) BW160 + BT/BLE Combo Card (2TX) *[[MediaTek MT7922A22M Reference Design]] (NGFF M.2 2230) :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7922A22M/ RAS-MT7922A22M] (2021-07-08) • IC ID: 7542A-MT7922A22M :802.11ax (WiFi 6E) BW160 + BT/BLE Combo Card (2TX) <!-- *[[MediaTek MT7663 Reference Design]] :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7663 RAS-MT7663] (2020-01-06) *[[MediaTek MT7630E Reference Design]] :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7630E RAS-MT7630E] (2013-01-07) -->
